job.title: Software Engineer - Junior Level
job.description: Purpose of JobltbrgtltbrgtWe are currently seeking a talented Software Engineer  Junior Level for our Plano TX or 100 remote environment work locationsltbrgtltbrgtProvides support to the Enterprise and has an opportunity to significantly impact organizational growth and effectiveness through delivering best in class technology solutions Engaged in all phases of the software systems and application development lifecycle which include gathering and analyzing requirements designing testing documenting and implementing software responding to outages Identify and manage existing and emerging risks that stem from business activities and ensure these risks are effectively identified and escalated to be measured monitored and controlledltbrgtltbrgtThe selected candidate will join the Risk and Compliance team and will work on a multiuser high availability environment supporting one of the critical Risk Management Applications Metricstream They will also have opportunities to learn and support other technologies such as ServiceNow and SalesforceltbrgtltbrgtJob RequirementsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout UsaaltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtUSAA knows what it means to serve We facilitate the financial security of millions of US military members and their families This singular mission requires a dedication to innovative thinking at every levelltbrgtltbrgtUSAA Information Technology A Realistic PreviewltbrgtltbrgtUSAA Careers  World Class BenefitsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtPrimary ResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtIdentifies and manages existing and emerging risks that stem from business activities and the job roleltligtltligtEnsures risks associated with business activities are effectively identified measured monitored and controlled ltligtltligtFollows written risk and compliance policies and procedures for business activitiesltligtltligtDesign develop code and test technical solutions collaborating with senior engineersltligtltligtParticipate in codedesign reviews to ensure smooth daily operations and accurate planningltligtltligtMay begin to help organize work to deliver features and solutionsltligtltligtResolves simple production issues with some assistance through troubleshooting applications independentlyltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtMinimum RequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBachelors degree in related field of study OR Certification from an approved technical field of study OR 4 additional years of related experience beyond the minimum requiredltligtltligt2 years of software development experience specific to a disciplinetechnologyltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt12 years of support engineering experienceltligtltligt12 years of experience of troubleshooting in a multiuser high availability environmentltligtltligt12 Years of experience in a professional environmentltligtltligtStrong analytical skillsproblem solvingconceptual thinkingltligtltligtExperience working in a production support or development environmentltbrgtltligtltulgtThe above description reflects the details considered necessary to describe the principal functions of the job and should not be construed as a detailed description of all the work requirements that may be performed in the jobltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtCompensationltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtUSAA has an effective process for assessing market data and establishing ranges to ensure we remain competitive You are paid within the salary range based on your experience and market position The salary range for this position is 66300  119500 this does not include geographic differential it may be applied based on your work location Employees may be eligible for pay incentives based on overall corporate and individual performance or at the discretion of the USAA Board of DirectorsltbrgtltulgtltligtGeographical Differential Geographic pay differential is additional pay provided to eligible employees working in locations where market pay levels are above the national averageltbrgtltligtltulgtShift Premium will be addressed on an individualbasis for applicable roles that are consistently scheduled for noncore hoursltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtBenefitsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAt USAA our employees enjoy bestinclass benefits to support their physical financial and emotional wellness These benefits include comprehensive medical dental and vision plans 401k pension life insurance parental benefits adoption assistance paid time off program with paid holidays plus 16 paid volunteer hours and various wellness programs Additionally our career path planning and continuing education assists employees with their professional goals Please visit ltstronggtUSAA Total Rewardsltstronggt for more detailsltbrgtltbrgtRelocation assistance is ltstronggtnot ltstronggtltstronggtavailableltstronggt for this
